articles.description: Man mountain defender Semi Ajayi has enjoyed a marked improvement in his game during 2022, believes Albion boss Steve Bruce.
articles.content:
The Nigerian centre-back, 28, gave a typically powerful performance in Saturdays 1-1 draw at Middlesbrough.
The former Rotherham and Cardiff stopper played in a central defensive duo alongside Dara … [+2230 chars]

articles.title: Perez details Hamilton influence of lost Hungarian GP podium - GPFans EN
articles.description: Sergio Perez has revealed his failure in undercutting Lewis Hamilton cost him a Hungarian Grand Prix podium.
articles.content:
Sergio Perez has revealed his failure in undercutting Lewis Hamilton cost him a Hungarian Grand Prix podium.

articles.description: Watch as Myles Hesson hits a buzzer-beating two-point shot to win an historic 3x3 basketball gold for England who beat Australia 17-16 at the 2022 Commonweal...
